channel.title: Chaos Realm - A Near Reality Remake
channel.description:
Based off of one of the most successful servers with nearly 5 years of up time, Near-Reality, we present you with Chaos-Realm. Built upon the V13.2 client, you can once again enjoy the flawless PvP, rewarding PvM and community you have come to expect from an RSPS. Have yet to experience this client? We encourage you to try the once #1 server feel with a unique, thrilling twist.
[B]Game Links[/b] - [url=http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/showthread.php?t=224]http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/showthread.php?t=224[/url] [B]Forums[/B] - [url=http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/index.php]http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/index.php[/url]
What sets Chaos-Realm apart from other servers?
[B]Features[/B]
- Flawless pking allowing for perfect switches and hybriding - No down time - No lag - Perfected Duel arena - Active, friendly staff team - Development team that listens to its community - Custom items - Frequent updates - Curse Prayers - Both donor and donor+ exclusive islands - Nex armors, Korasi and new firecape - Wilderness targets with rewards - Ganodermic armor - Pvp armour - Active clans in both singles and mutli - Working spirit shields - Mod day events - Kill streaks and rewards - Unique Bloodlust system for clan battles - Opportunities to make IRL cash! - Good voting rewards - Working special attacks - Fight caves - God Wars - Strong and stable economy - Top pker announcements - Generous starter pack
Here at Chaos-Realm we strive to make your playing experience the best it can be. We guarantee an unforgettable RSPS environment filled with countless journeys. Whether they be toppling gargantuan bosses, triumphing over your foe in the wild or establishing wealth the likes have never been seen, we look forward to welcoming you to your new home, Chaos-Realm.
[IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/Qjjui.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0002.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0003.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0007.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0006.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.chaos-realm.com/media/CRPK0005.png[/img]

item.title: Chaos Realm - A Near Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @Chaos_Realm Chaos Realm
item.description:
@Chaos_Realm wrote:

Based off of one of the most successful servers with nearly 5 years of up time, Near-Reality, we present you with Chaos-Realm. Built upon the V13.2 client, you can once again enjoy the flawless PvP, rewarding PvM and community you have come to expect from an RSPS. Have yet to experience this client? We encourage you to try the once #1 server feel with a unique, thrilling twist.

Game Links - http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/showthread.php?t=224
[B]Forums[/B] - http://www.chaos-realm.com/forums/index.php

What sets Chaos-Realm apart from other servers?

[B]Features[/B]

  • Flawless pking allowing for perfect switches and hybriding
  • No down time
  • No lag
  • Perfected Duel arena
  • Active, friendly staff team
  • Development team that listens to its community
  • Custom items
  • Frequent updates
  • Curse Prayers
  • Both donor and donor+ exclusive islands
  • Nex armors, Korasi and new firecape
  • Wilderness targets with rewards
  • Ganodermic armor
  • Pvp armour
  • Active clans in both singles and mutli
  • Working spirit shields
  • Mod day events
  • Kill streaks and rewards
  • Unique Bloodlust system for clan battles
  • Opportunities to make IRL cash!
  • Good voting rewards
  • Working special attacks
  • Fight caves
  • God Wars
  • Strong and stable economy
  • Top pker announcements
  • Generous starter pack

Here at Chaos-Realm we strive to make your playing experience the best it can be. We guarantee an unforgettable RSPS environment filled with countless journeys. Whether they be toppling gargantuan bosses, triumphing over your foe in the wild or establishing wealth the likes have never been seen, we look forward to welcoming you to your new home, Chaos-Realm.
